<cs> my lords i hope i shall learn better from experience than the previous government <e> <s> i do not wish to be ungenerous to the noble and learned lord and i certainly did not intend to suggest any failing in the highest standards of courtesy and honour which he always observes and he knows that i have the very highest opinion of him in every personal way <e> <s> i thank him for his kindly approach to this matter and i do not know that we can carry it usefully very much further <e>
